headline: Here we grow!
caption: My dream to grow flowers really began while running on a wet, spring morning. My husband and I passed a 163 year old farmhouse on 5 1/2 acres for sale in Aurora, Ohio.

headline: Groundbreaking Work
caption: Last fall, with help from the great team at Ohio Earth Food in Hartville, we began to amend our soil.  We're committed to offering the most beautiful blooms possible, and the only way for us to do that is to start with a solid soil foundation.

headline: Spring on the Farm
caption: It was all hands on deck to burn landscape fabric this month.  We burned over 900 feet using a template that Mike made.
